name: Save the Reactor (Post Jam Edition)
description:
Post Ludum Dare 50 version. The original Jam Version, was created over a weekend with the theme of Delay the Inevitable.

Rotate your shields with your mouse or touch, to keep the particles from overloading the reactor.

Even with the changes below, it's a quick/hard game.

All of the graphics were created by Liz (except for the red atom).

Changes:

  • Added Red atoms that clear the Reactor Zone when hit with your shield. 
  • Shields now regenerate when not at full power.
